message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split in my favor, considering I have more urgency due to inflation affecting my gains in future rounds.

Hi Alice, I understand your concern about inflation, but a 60-40 split seems a bit unbalanced. Since inflation will reduce your $50 value by 20% if you reject (making it worth $40 to you), this 50-50 split is actually fair. You get more actual dollars than if we continue to another round where inflation affects you further.
